content.title: Mid-Face Lift + Neck Lift - Cosmetic Surgery Thailand - Bangkok, Samui Clinic, Phuket and Pattaya
h2: Mid-Face Lift + Neck Lift in Phuket
Nights in Hospital: 3Nights in Ibis Phuket Patong Hotel: 10Duration of operation is about 3-4 hours and you need to stay in Thailand for at least 13 days.
*We never spam or use high-pressure sales tactics. We promise.
Hospitals | Prices | Doctors | Flights | Hotels | Before & After pictures
paragraphs: Package Includes:✓ Surgery at Internationally Accredited Hospital (Phuket International Hospital)✓ Operating Theatre, Anaesthesiologist and all associated surgery & Hospital charges✓ All drugs, routine and take home medications✓ Surgery by a renowned Plastic Surgeon, including pre and post-surgery consultations✓ Transfers: Airport / Hotel / Hospital✓ 3 nights (post-surgery) in a Private Hospital Room✓ 10 nights in Ibis Phuket Patong Hotel✓ Support from BeautyMed customer relations manager
Guarantee:Usually if there is a complication or you are not happy with the results, the hospital will correct the problem free of charge.
Wish to upgrade your accommodation?(Current package price includes Ibis Phuket Patong Hotel “Package I”)

The Ibis Phuket Patong is a tranquil oasis in the heart of Phuket, just 500m from Patong Beach. This modern, fun and friendly hotel offers 260 comfortable rooms. The Ibis offers guests the best value for money with the convenience of 24 hour reception, 24 hour drink and snack service and WiFi internet in all rooms.

With the accent firmly lying on tranquility, comfort and contemporary style, The Aspasia Phuket offers a choice of superior accommodation and facilities that includes a restaurant, two swimming pools, a gymnasium, business centre, meeting room, high-speed wireless Internet access and spa. Original paintings and antiques are displayed in the spa, restaurant and lobby, complementing the style of decor. There is easy access between the twelve buildings and facilities forming the resort. The property is set amongst beautifully landscaped gardens, filled with colorful tropical planting.

Dewa is a perfect Phuket hotel resort catering for the discerning traveller looking for a private pool villa or alternatively a beach view apartment. This boutique beach resort is ideally located meters from the aquamarine waters of the Andaman sea on Phuket’s tranquil Nai Yang Beach, adjacent to Sirinath National Park. The resort enjoys a spacious Asian themed and tastefully designed ambient reception area that warms your senses on arrival, and the friendly greeting and Thai hospitality is ever present throughout your stay.

The Five-Star Millennium Resort is located in an idyllic location and set within lush tropical landscaping. This magnificent Phuket hotel consists of two separate wings. The Beach side features a total of 197 spacious rooms while The Lakeside has 221 rooms, each furnished with rustic charm.
